document.docAuthor: Yakovlev, Roman V., Pljustch, Igor G., Skrylnik, Yuriy, Pak, Oleg & Witt, Thomas J.
document.masterDocTitle: The Cossidae (Lepidoptera) of Afghanistan with description of three new species and special notes on the fauna of Bande-Amir National Park

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The Cossidae (Lepidoptera) of Afghanistan with description of three new species and special notes on the fauna of Bande-Amir National Park

subSubSection.paragraph:
Staudinger, 1884
: 139–140 .

Type species:
Cossus (Holcocerus) nobilis
Staudinger, 1884
, by subsequent designation by
Kirby ( 1892 )
.

Holcocerus nobilis
Staudinger, 1884
(
Figs 11 −12
, 97 )
Type locality: Askhabad, Tekke [Ashkhabad, Turkmenistan ].

Holcocerus tancrei
Pungeler, 1898
( Figs 13 , 98 )

Pungeler, 1898
: 58 .
Type locality: Merw [Mary, Turkmenistan ].

Habitat and biology. Flight period: May. Altitude: 500 m (
Daniel 1964
). Host plant:
Haloxylon aphyllum
( Amaranthaceae ) (
Baghestani et al. 2006
).

Material examined:
12 females
, Masar-Sharif,
31 . 5.1973
, coll. Dr. Liedgens ( MWM ).

Holcocerus gloriosa (
Erschoff, 1874
)
(
Figs 14 −15
, 99 )
Type locality: „in monte Karak in parte orientali desertorum Kisil-Kum sito“ [Karak Mt., Kizil-Kum desert, Turkmenistan ].

Type material: lectotype (male) in ZMMU , examined. Designation by
Yakovlev ( 2006 a)
Distribution: N. Afghanistan , N. Iran , Turkmenistan , Uzbekistan , S. Kazakhstan (
Yakovlev 2006 a
). Material examined:
1 male
,
1 female
, Afghanistan-Iran Grenze, Kohsan, 1000 m , 13 .0 5.77 , de Freina ( MWM ).

In southern Afghanistan : subspecies mesopotamicus
Watkins & Buxton, 1921
Holcocerus gloriosa mesopotamicus
Watkins & Buxton, 1921
: 86
.

Material examined:
2 males
, Sarobi, 28 .0 6.1956 , Amsel ( ZSSM ).

Holcocerus holosericeus
Staudinger, 1884
(
Figs 16−18
, 100 )
Type locality: Askhabad [Ashkhabad, Turkmenistan ].

Type material: lectotype (male) in MHUB , examined. Designation by
Yakovlev ( 2006 a)
. Distribution: Kazakhstan , Mongolia , Kirgizstan , Uzbekistan , Tadzhikistan , Turkmenistan , NW China , Afghanistan , Iran (
Yakovlev 2006 a
).

Nominative subspecies was reported for Herat, Bala Murghab (
Daniel 1969
). Material examined:
9 males
, Afghanistan , Masar Sharif, 31 .0 5.1973 , coll. Dr. Liedgens ( MWM ); female, N. Afghanistan , Prov. Herat, Bala Murghab, 25.5 .- 10.06.1964 , 470 m , coll. O. Jakes ( MWM ); female, Kabul, Volk ( ZSSM ).

In southern Afghanistan : subspecies darwesthana
Daniel, 1959
Type locality: SW Afghanistan , Darwesthan.
Type material: holotype (male) in ZSSM , examined.
